1.name: Michael Prentice
1.title: Founder, GDG Space Coast
1.bio: Michael Prentice is a consultant on Angular, Material Design, software architecture, and agile project management. He is the founder of GDG Space Coast and a GDG NA South Region Mentor. He is a team collaborator on Angular Material and GDG-X. He is currently working on his own company, DevIntent.
